ygData.subject: Re: Specialization.. is it working?
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks, it s now working for me as of the patch from yesterday.
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks, it's now working for me as of the patch from yesterday.

> ----------
> From: Shadowwalker[SMTP:Shadowwalker@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 11, 1999 11:34 AM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Specialization.. is it working?
>
> From: "Shadowwalker" <Shadowwalker@...>
>
> I have trained in specialization. Being a wizard, I dumped most my
> training
> points into Evoke, though I put a point into all 5 to get the basics. I
> am
> now 52 in Evoke and 24 or 25 in the other four skills. I have also seen
> Specialize: Evoke and Specialize: Abjure go up from use since training in
> them. As I recall, they were somewhere in the middle on the of the list
> of
> trainable skills. I think it goes combat/usable skills, specialize
> skills,
> trade skills, language skills from top to bottom in the trainers list.
>
> -Shadowwalker of Karana
> Level 24 Wizard
>
>
> > Well the patch update says that specialization is now in place, but I
> still
> > cannot train in it at my guild. I asked in game and several other
> people
> > also could not train in it. Simply does not show up in the list. Has
> > anyone succesfully trained in this yet?
>
